title: Konstantin Pogreban
text:
Konstantin Fyodorovich Pogreban (; born 6 July 1987) is a Russian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Barnaul">FC Dynamo Barnaul</a> on 27 March 2008 in a game against <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a>.
